name: Digital Dungeon
description: Help a prisoner to escape from the virtual reality jail in our game Digital Dungeon. It is an extremely exciting puzzle shooter, where your main weapon is...physics! Remember electrostatics, when two elements of different electrical charge are drawn to each other. You'll also need a huge explosion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space
